body:
Do you know about these methods 1. post(Runnable runnable) 2. postDelayed(Runnable runnable, long delaytime)

Both of them are methods of View class so you can call them on any view like button, textview etc.

I am not that clear from your question but I think you might need second method to get delay of some time on UI thread.
